Class Score

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.scoring.Score
public final class Score extends Object
Manages the player's score, level, and rows cleared in the game. It uses JavaFX properties for observable score, level, and rows cleared values.

  • Property Summary

    Properties
    Type
    Property
    Description
    javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyIntegerProperty
    level
    Returns the read-only integer property for the level.
    javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyIntegerProperty
    rowsCleared
    Returns the read-only integer property for the number of rows cleared.
    javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyIntegerProperty
    score
    Returns the read-only integer property for the score.

    Constructs a new Score object.

    Method
    Description

    add(int i)
    Adds the specified value to the current score.

  • Constructor Details

    • Score

      public Score()
      Constructs a new Score object. Initializes the player's score, level, and rows cleared to their default starting values.

    • add

      public void add(int i)
      Adds the specified value to the current score.
      Parameters:
      i - The value to add to the score.

    • addClearedRows

      public void addClearedRows(int rows)
      Adds the specified number of cleared rows and updates the level accordingly.
      Parameters:
      rows - The number of rows that were cleared.

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the score, level, and rows cleared to their initial values.
